file_insights.changes_made: Added sortable: true to 4 column definitions (createdAt, user, action, entityType)
Added sortable: true to 4 column definitions (name, manufacturer, modelNumber, status)
Added sortable: true to 5 column definitions (name, manufacturer, quantity, expectedDelivery, status)
Added sortable: true to 6 column definitions (rfi_number, subject, category, priority, status, due_date)

patterns_discovered.description: All changes follow identical pattern of adding sortable: true property to column definitions
Changes are purely declarative configuration additions with no functional code modifications needed
patterns_discovered.implication: Low risk changes that leverage existing DataTable sorting infrastructure

patterns_discovered.description: Sorting enabled on both simple columns (status, priority) and complex columns with custom render functions
patterns_discovered.implication: DataTable component handles sorting logic independently of column rendering

gotchas_discovered.description: Not all columns marked as sortable in each page (e.g., action columns with icons excluded)
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Developer appears intentional about which columns support sorting, likely based on data type compatibility

gotchas_discovered.description: Changes only affect UI layer; no evidence of backend sort parameter validation
gotchas_discovered.context: Backend was likely already prepared in previous subtasks

gotchas_discovered.description: Same enhancement needed across 4 separate files suggests no shared component abstraction
gotchas_discovered.implication: Future maintenance may require coordinated changes across multiple files

approach_outcome.description: Successfully enabled sorting on DataTable columns across all specified pages by adding sortable: true property to appropriate column definitions

recommendations.recommendation: Consider extracting column definitions to shared constants to reduce duplication across pages
recommendations.rationale: 19 lines added across 4 files suggests opportunity for DRY principle improvement

recommendations.recommendation: Document which columns are intentionally excluded from sorting and why
recommendations.rationale: Helps future developers understand the pattern and maintain consistency

recommendations.recommendation: Verify sorting behavior works correctly with custom render functions and special data types
recommendations.rationale: Columns like status badges and formatted dates should sort by underlying values, not display text
